title: The Wizard of Oz
short_plot_summary: Young girl Dorothy is swept away to the magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends, the Scarecrow, Tin Man, and Cowardly Lion, to see the Wizard, who can help her return home.
explanation: A tornado, which transports Dorothy to the land of Oz
The ruby slippers, magical shoes Dorothy wears that hold the key to her returning home
A lion, representing the Cowardly Lion, one of Dorothy's companions on her journey
A wizard, symbolizing the Wizard of Oz, the powerful figure Dorothy and her friends seek out for help
A rainbow, representing the journey to the Emerald City and the hope of finding the way back to Kansas
